original_text: And Aaron said to Moses, “Behold, today they have offered their sin offering and their burnt offering before the Lord, and yet such things as these have happened to me! If I had eaten the sin offering today, would the Lord have approved?”
korean_text: 아론이 모세에게 이르되 오늘 그들이 그 속죄제와 번제를 여호와께 드렸어도 이런 일이 내게 임하였거늘 오늘 내가 속죄제물을 먹었더라면 여호와께서 어찌 좋게 여기셨으리요

sentences.original_text: Behold, today they have offered their sin offering
sentences.korean_translation: 보십시오, 오늘 그들이 그들의 죄 제물을

sentences.original_text: and their burnt offering before the Lord,
and yet such things as these have happened to me!
If I had eaten the sin offering today,
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 내가 오늘 죄 제물을 먹었더라면,
